## getResolver() function

Creates a DID Resolver that can resolve Peer DIDs (for the 0 and 2 num_algo values)

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function getResolver(): Record<string, DIDResolver>
```

**Returns:**

Record&lt;string, DIDResolver&gt;
